original_text: And I will bring a sword upon you, that shall avenge the quarrel of my covenant: and when ye are gathered together within your cities, I will send the pestilence among you; and ye shall be delivered into the hand of the enemy.
korean_text: 내가 칼을 너희에게로 가져다가 언약을 어긴 원수를 갚을 것이며 너희가 성읍에 모일지라도 너희 중에 염병을 보내고 너희를 대적의 손에 넘길 것이며

sentences.original_text: And I will bring a sword upon you
that shall avenge the quarrel of my covenant
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 내 언약의 다툼을 갚게 되리라

sentences.original_text: and when ye are gathered together within your cities
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희가 너희 도시 안에 모여들 때

sentences.original_text: I will send the pestilence among you
and ye shall be delivered into the hand of the enemy
